name: Arcade Dungeon
description:
This game was made for my thesis project. It is a collection of four games, accessed through an Arcade shop, called Arcade Dungeon

You saw a small door you've never noticed before, labeled Arcade Dungeon. In that small basement , you find an old, forgotten arcade shop.   Although, you've never heard of these games before.

Walk up to a machine  to play a game.     Controls for each game can be found inside the shop. To exit, walk back up the stairs
